title: Create marketing website for Orion Star Tuition Centre (Classes 1–12)

requirements.text: Create a responsive multi-section website for “Orion Star Tuition Centre” that clearly communicates the centre name and that it teaches students from Class 1 to Class 12.

quotes: create an website for my tuition centre. The name is Orion star tuition centre. we teach students from class 1 till 12.

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays the exact name “Orion Star Tuition Centre”.
Homepage explicitly states that the centre teaches Class 1 through Class 12.
Layout is usable on mobile and desktop (responsive).

requirements.text: Implement core homepage content sections with clear English copy: Hero (headline + short description), About/Why Choose Us, Classes & Subjects (grouped for Class 1–5, 6–8, 9–10, 11–12), Teaching approach, and a Call-to-Action that directs users to contact/enquiry.

quotes: we teach students from class 1 till 12.

acceptanceCriteria: Classes/Subjects section clearly covers Class 1–12 using grouped categories.
There is at least one prominent CTA button (e.g., “Enquire Now”) visible in the hero area.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Add a Contact/Enquiry section containing a form (student name, parent/guardian name, class/grade, phone/email, message) with client-side validation and a clear success/failure state. Submit the form to the backend for storage so enquiries persist across reloads.
acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields before submission and shows inline errors.
Successful submission shows a confirmation message and clears the form.
Submitted enquiries are stored in the canister and remain available after page reload.

requirements.text: Create a simple admin view (not publicly advertised in navigation) that lists submitted enquiries (most recent first) with their submitted fields and timestamp, and includes a basic delete action per enquiry.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin view displays a list of enquiries including class/grade and contact info fields provided.
Delete action removes an enquiry from storage and it no longer appears after refresh.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, creative visual theme appropriate for an education/tuition centre (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) and use it consistently across the website (do not use a blue/purple-dominant theme).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across all sections (buttons, headings, cards, backgrounds).
The primary look is not blue/purple-dominant.

requirements.text: Generate and include required static image assets in the frontend and render them in the UI from the static assets directory (frontend/public/assets/generated), without routing images through the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Homepage visibly uses the generated logo and hero image.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutable paths; compose them instead.
nonGoals: Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity would be allowed, but it is not required for this request)
Integration with external databases or external CRMs

required: Tuition centre logo mark with a star/orion-inspired motif, clean and modern (orion-star-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide homepage hero banner illustration with students studying and subtle star/orion theme, warm academic feel (orion-star-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of 3 simple outline icons in a consistent style: book, graduation cap, telescope/star (orion-star-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
